title: Hour 1: Repeat After Me
description:
In this episode, Ryan Clark, Courtney Cronin and Chris "Mad Dog" Russo debate the likelihood of the Rams repeating as Super Bowl Champions and if Nick Chubb and Kareem Hunt are the best RB tandem in the NFL. Why is everyone ganging up on RC? It might have something to do with his choice for the best quarterback in the AFC North. Plus, are the Mets the best team in the National League? We go around the horn with the crew to get their takes on that as well as who they believe has the best offense in the AFC West.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
itunes:author: ESPN, Stephen A. Smith, Molly Qerim Rose
